      • getForecast

        public Channel getForecast(java.lang.String woeid,
                           DegreeUnit unit)
                    throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Gets the Weather RSS feed.
        Parameters:
        woeid - the location WOEID.
        unit - the degrees units.
        Returns:
        the retrieved Channel.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if an error occurs parsing the response.
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs communicating with the service.
